name: Mythical Spellweave Legwraps
description: A blast of elemental energies erupts from you, pushing back all nearby foes.

name: Boneweave Leggings
description: Create an occult sigil on the ground that consumes the life-force of enemies caught within its power, returning a portion of the damage dealt as health to you.

name: Demonbone Legplates
description: "The real challenge in the creation of this armor came in acquiring the necessary parts."

name: Rimestone Legguards
description: Unleash a surge of chilling energies at nearby foes.

name: Runeplates of Ignaffar
description: A wave of scorching flame emanates from you in a destructive path.

name: Wendigomane Leggings
description: "The fur stinks of old blood, uncertain whether it is from the wendigo itself or from its past victims."

name: Deathwhisper Leggings
description: Foes who dare strike you will face Amarasta`s wrath.

name: Hellforged Legplates
description: "Forged in the fiery breath of a hellhound."

name: Arcane Harmony Leggings
description: A blast of elemental energies erupts from you, pushing back all nearby foes.

name: Fateweaver`s Leggings
description: "Dozens of incantations and words of power were whispered into the threads which now form these leggings."

name: Thornhide Legguards
description: You become untouchable to your foes as a barrier of thorns forms around you.

name: Wraithborne Legwraps
description: A blast of Aether energy knocks your attackers back.

name: Chausses of Barbaros
description: "Barbaros was a legendary fighter in the ranks of the Black Legion who met his end on the field of battle, surrounded by dozens of mangled corpses of both men and horses."

name: Dread Knight`s Legplates
description: Unleash a wave of tormented spirits to sap your foes of life.

name: Leggings of Arcane Currents
description: Creates an arcane seal on the ground imbued with destructive force.

name: Legwraps of the Tranquil Mind
description: Tear a warp in time itself at the location of your attacker.

name: Mageguard Legguards
description: A blast of elemental energies erupts from you, pushing back all nearby foes.

name: Nidalla`s Legwraps
description: Foes who dare strike you may find themselves with a nasty surprise as Nidalla`s signature toxin seeps into their veins.

name: Pretty Great Pants
description: "Actually, they`re just ok."

description: Immense electric force emanates from you, cascading to additional enemies.
